cn: 那第二個的話其實就是戴口罩。
py: Nà dì èr gè dehuà qíshí jiùshì dài kǒuzhào.
en: The second one is actually wearing a mask.

cn: 必須要說現在戴口罩可能很普遍嘛，
py: Bìxū yào shuō xiànzàidài kǒuzhào kěnéng hěn pǔbiàn ma,
en: It must be said that wearing a mask may be very common now.

cn: 因為有這個疫情的關係。
py: yīnwèi yǒu zhège yìqíng de guānxì.
en: Because there is this epidemic relationship.

cn: 可是那個時候還沒有疫情啊，
py: Kěshì nàgè shíhòu hái méiyǒu yìqíng a,
en: But there was no epidemic at that time.

cn: 所以你在澳洲幾乎不會看到有人戴口罩。
py: suǒyǐ nǐ zài àozhōu jīhū bù huì kàn dào yǒurén dài kǒuzhào.
en: So you hardly ever see people wearing masks in Australia.

cn: 我好像沒有看過或是非常少，
py: Wǒ hǎoxiàng méiyǒu kànguò huò shì fēicháng shǎo,
en: I don't think I've seen any or very few.

cn: 在台灣就算沒有疫情，
py: zài táiwān jiùsuàn méiyǒu yìqíng,
en: In Taiwan, even if there was no epidemic.

cn: 還是會看到很多人戴口罩，
py: háishì huì kàn dào hěnduō rén dài kǒuzhào,
en: you would still see a lot of people wearing masks.

cn: 因為我們戴口罩有蠻多原因的，
py: yīnwèi wǒmen dài kǒuzhào yǒu mán duō yuányīn de,
en: There are many reasons why we wear masks.

cn: 第一個可能是因為自己感冒了，
py: dì yī gè kěnéng shì yīnwèi zìjǐ gǎnmàole,
en: The first may be because they have a cold.

cn: 有點不舒服就會戴口罩，
py: yǒudiǎn bú shūfú jiù huì dài kǒuzhào,
en: feel a little uncomfortable, then will wear a mask.

cn: 就是不想要傳染給別人，
py: jiùshì bùxiǎng yào chuánrǎn gěi biérén,
en: don't want to spread the infection to others.

cn: 或是自己咳嗽的時候會不好意思。
py: huò shì zìjǐ késòu de shíhòu huì bù hǎoyìsi.
en: Or when you cough, you excuse yourself

cn: 也有可能是過敏。
py: Yěyǒu kěnéng shì guòmǐn.
en: There may also be allergies.

cn: 有些人因為季節的變化的關係，
py: Yǒuxiē rén yīnwèi jìjié de biànhuà de guānxì,
en: Some people because of the change of seasons.

cn: 會一直打噴嚏，
py: huì yīzhí dǎ pēntì,
en: They sneeze all the time.

cn: 他們也可能會因此戴口罩。
py: tāmen yě kěnéng huì yīncǐ dài kǒuzhào.
en: They may also wear a mask for this reason.

cn: 不然就是有時候空氣不好也會戴。
py: Bùrán jiùshì yǒu shíhòu kōngqì bù hǎo yě huì dài.
en: Or they may wear them even if the air is bad sometimes.

cn: 還有可能就是因為很冷，
py: Hái yǒu kěnéng jiùshì yīnwèi hěn lěng,
en: It could also be because it's cold.

cn: 像是很多人會騎車，
py: xiàng shì hěnduō rén huì qí chē,
en: For example, many people will ride bikes.

cn: 騎摩托車。
py: qí mótuō chē.
en: Riding motorcycles.

cn: 然後風很大就會戴口罩，
py: Ránhòu fēng hěn dà jiù huì dài kǒuzhào,
en: Then the wind is very strong will wear a mask.

cn: 比較溫暖。
py: bǐjiào wēnnuǎn.
en: Warmer.

cn: 所以有各種原因，
py: Suǒyǐ yǒu gèzhǒng yuányīn,
en: So there are various reasons.

cn: 就算不是疫情，
py: jiùsuàn bùshì yìqíng,
en: Even if it's not an epidemic.

cn: 也是非常正常的事情。
py: yěshì fēicháng zhèngcháng de shìqíng.
en: Even if it is not an epidemic, it is very normal.

cn: 可是在澳洲或是在國外的話，
py: Kěshì zài àozhōu huò shì zài guó wài dehuà,
en: But in Australia or abroad, if you wear a mask

cn: 如果戴口罩，
py: rúguǒ dài kǒuzhào,
en: If you wear a mask

cn: 大家應該會嚇到，
py: dàjiā yīnggāi huì xià dào,
en: people should be scared.

cn: 我是說在疫情之前，
py: wǒ shì shuō zài yìqíng zhīqián,
en: I mean, before the epidemic.

cn: 可能會覺得你發生了什麼事情。
py: kěnéng huì juédé nǐ fāshēngle shénme shìqíng.
en: I mean, before the epidemic, you might think that something has happened to you.

cn: 因為我平常也沒有特別愛戴口罩，
py: Yīnwèi wǒ píngcháng yě méiyǒu tèbié ài dài kǒuzhào,
en: Because I don't usually wear a mask.

cn: 我也很少，
py: wǒ yě hěn shǎo,
en: I rarely.

cn: 幾乎沒有感冒。
py: jīhū méiyǒu gǎnmào.
en: I hardly ever catch a cold.

cn: 所以我也沒有特別想說要戴口罩，
py: Suǒyǐ wǒ yě méiyǒu tèbié xiǎng shuō yào dài kǒuzhào,
en: So I didn't particularly want to say that I should wear a mask, either.

cn: 但是在冬天的時候，
py: dànshì zài dōngtiān de shíhòu,
en: But in the wintertime.

cn: 因為墨爾本的冬天算是還蠻冷的，
py: yīnwèi mò'ěrběn de dōngtiān suànshì hái mán lěng de,
en: Because it's pretty cold in Melbourne in the winter.

cn: 然後那個時候我會騎腳踏車，
py: ránhòu nàgè shíhòu wǒ huì qí jiǎotàchē,
en: And then I ride my bike at that time.

cn: 所以風超大。
py: suǒyǐ fēng chāodà.
en: So it's very windy.

cn: 我都是一騎就狂流鼻水，
py: Wǒ dū shì yīqí jiù kuáng liú bíshuǐ,
en: My nose would run like crazy when I rode.

cn: 一直流鼻水。
py: yīzhí liú bíshuǐ.
en: My nose was running all the time.

cn: 所以那個時候我就覺得啊，
py: Suǒyǐ nàgè shíhòu wǒ jiù juédé a,
en: So at that time I thought, ah,

cn: 我應該要戴口罩。
py: wǒ yīnggāi yào dài kǒuzhào.
en: I should wear a mask.
